root.name: The Black Eyed Peas Experience
root.description: The Black Eyed Peas Experience is a dance-focused game from Ubisoft that is modeled as the follow-up to Michael Jackson: The Experience. Polygonally rendered versions of the group--the whole group--will appear in the game.Song List*=xbox360 exclusive^=Wii exclusiveBoom Boom PowCall to New York*Disco ClubDon't LieDon't Phunk With My HeartDon't Stop the PartyDum DiddlyEverything WonderfulFashion BeatsHey MamaI Gotta FeelingImma BeJust Can't Get EnoughLet's Get It StartedLight Up the NightLove You Long Time*Meet Me HalfwayMy HumpsMy StylePump ItRock That BodyShut UpShowdown*Smells Like Funk*SomedayTake It OffThe Best One Yet (The Boy)The Situation*The Time (Dirty Bit)They Don't Want Music^Whenever
